footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team of experts dedicated to your well-being and transformation.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew prepared from the decoction of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). This brew has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for healing, spiritual, and self-discovery purposes. Its name means “rope of the spirits” or “vine of the soul” in Quechua.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca induces expanded states of consciousness, allowing access to deep levels of the subconscious. This process facilitates the release of emotional blockages, the healing of traumas, and a greater understanding of oneself and the universe. It acts as a mirror of the soul, revealing patterns of thought and behavior that limit our potential, and opening the door to lasting transformation.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Medicine as a Spiritual Master
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a wise and compassionate teacher. Its spirit guides each participant on a unique and personalized inner journey, showing what needs to be seen to heal and grow. The experience is a profound dialogue with our own essence, where we receive clarity, forgiveness, and a renewed connection with life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a clear vision of your life path, your relationships, and your purpose. Ayahuasca helps you dissolve confusion and find answers to deep questions.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and negative emotional patterns rooted in the subconscious. The ceremony offers a safe space to process and heal past wounds.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep sense of connection with yourself, with others, and with nature. Ayahuasca reminds us that we are part of an interconnected whole.
groupCeremonyDescription: Our group ceremonies are the most common option. They are held in a safe and trusting environment, where the group's energy enhances the individual healing experience. Facilitated by our expert guides, these ceremonies offer a space of containment and mutual support, ideal for those seeking a shared transformation.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those who prefer a more intimate and personalized journey, we offer private ceremonies. These sessions are designed for one or two people and allow for guidance completely focused on your specific needs. They are ideal for deep healing processes, couples, or for those seeking a first experience with more privacy.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is an essential part of your journey with the medicine. Following these guidelines will help you open up to the experience in the safest and most receptive way possible.
preparationProcessDescription: Our process is designed to accompany you every step of your journey, ensuring a safe, profound, and transformative experience. From initial preparation to final integration, our team will provide the support and guidance you need.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where music, chants (icaros), and expert guidance accompany you on your inner journey. The ceremony is a deep dialogue with the medicine and yourself.
experienceProcessDescription: Every journey is unique. You may experience visions, emotional release, and profound revelations. Our team supports you with compassion and respect throughout the process.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you process and understand your experiences, so you can apply the teachings of the medicine in your daily life and continue your path of growth.
dietSubtitle: It is recommended to follow this diet at least 3-5 days before and after the ceremony to purify the body and mind.
allowedFoodsList: • Fresh fruits and vegetables • Whole grains (rice, quinoa, oats) • Legumes (lentils, chickpeas) • White meats (chicken, fish), grilled or steamed • Water, herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList: • Red meats and processed meats • Fried, processed, or high-fat foods • Dairy and derivatives • Refined sugars and strong spices • Caffeine, alcohol, and other recreational drugs
mentalPrepSubtitle: Cultivating a calm mind and an open heart is key to an enriching experience.
meditationDescription: Dedicate time to meditate or simply be in silence. This calms the nervous system and helps you connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what brings you to the ceremony. What do you want to heal, understand, or release? Write down your intentions to give a clear direction to your journey.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, dreams, and emotions before and after the ceremony. It is a powerful tool for integration.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring intense emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel without judgment. Trust that everything that arises is for your healing. Our team is here to support you with love and without judgment, creating a safe space for your vulnerability.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Dress comfortably and prepare for a night of introspection.
comfortItemsList: • Comfortable and warm clothing (preferably white or light-colored) • Blanket and pillow for your comfort • Water bottle • A personal object or amulet (optional)
essentialsList: • Personal hygiene items • Towel • An open mind and heart
contactCommunityText: Join our community on social media and stay up to date with our upcoming ceremonies, retreats, and workshops. Share your journey and find support in a space of growth and healing.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming events and find the perfect ceremony for your healing journey.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here you will find the ceremonies you are registered for. Get ready for your journey.
noAssignedCeremoniesTitle: You have no assigned ceremonies yet
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: Explore our upcoming ceremonies and find the perfect one to start your healing journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the history, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca as an ancestral medicine.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the team of spiritual guides and facilitators who will accompany you in your process with dedication and respect.
preparationCtaDescription: Preparation is key. Access our complete guide on diet and mental preparation for your ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the ceremony details. Changes will be reflected immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Create a new ceremony for users to see and register for.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must provide a URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The ceremony will be permanently deleted.
finishCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to finish this ceremony?
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be moved to the 'Past Events' section and will no longer accept new reservations.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% down payment.
guide_desc_wilson: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. The changes will be saved permanently.
deleteGuideConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.

googleSuccessDescription: You have been logged in successfully.

errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to perform this action.

authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: To view all our ceremonies and manage your reservations, please sign in or create an account.
userManagementSubtitle: Manage users, their roles, and their status in the community.
allUsersDescription: Here you can view and manage all registered users.
errorFetchUsers: Could not load the list of users.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users on the platform.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's medical and intentional responses.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: 1. Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high/low blood pressure, diabetes, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: 2. Are you currently taking any medications, supplements, or herbs (including antidepressants like SSRIs, MAOIs)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: 3. Do you have a history of mental health conditions (depression, anxiety, psychosis, bipolar disorder, etc.)?
questionnaireExperience: 4. Have you had any previous experience with Ayahuasca or other medicinal plants/psychedelics?
questionnaireIntention: 5. What is your main intention or what are you looking for by participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements:
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please describe your mental health history:
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences:
noAnswersSubmitted: The user has not yet submitted their answers.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user will have access to. You can assign active, past, or inactive events.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I am here to help you on your healing path. How can I assist you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.
invitationTabDescription: Manage predefined messages for inviting users to complete the questionnaire via WhatsApp.
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the message ready!
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare for your journey. Your progress will be saved automatically.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have finished all the steps in the guide. You are now ready for your ceremony. If you need to review anything, you can return to this guide at any time.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your questionnaire. Please try again.
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I seek to heal an emotional wound, find clarity in my life, connect with my spirituality...
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: Here you can review the answers you provided.
themeCustomizationDescription: Adjust the application's colors for light and dark modes. The changes will be applied in real-time.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
backupSubtitle: Export or import all application data from a JSON file.
exportDataDescription: Create a complete backup of all data (users, ceremonies, content, etc.) in a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This action will overwrite all existing data.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been restored. The page will now reload.
importWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to import this file? An automatic backup of the current data will be created, but all data will be overwritten by the contents of the backup file.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can use it to revert the changes if something went wrong.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the state before the import.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to revert the last import? This will overwrite the current data with the automatic backup.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations users have had with the AI spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Explore interactions to better understand your users' needs.
errorLogsSubtitle: Monitor system errors to ensure the application runs smoothly.
systemLogsDescription: This lists the automatic errors captured by the system.
deleteLogConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this log?
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
analyticsDescription: Visualize which sections of the website receive the most user interaction.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This action will delete all click tracking data. It is irreversible.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to archive this ceremony?
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be hidden from public lists but not deleted. You can reactivate it later.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counters for this ceremony to zero.
